table.name: vtiger_knowlarityplugin
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_knowlarityplugin` ( `knowlaritypluginid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `k_api_key` varchar(128) DEFAULT NULL, `k_number` varchar(128) DEFAULT NULL, `k_acc_name` varchar(128) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`knowlaritypluginid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_knowlarityplugincf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_knowlarityplugincf` ( `knowlaritypluginid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`knowlaritypluginid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
